item.description:
Alright boys, here's the plan to start off a good weekend.

Friday Night, 10:15 PM, Part one of the meetup, the planning stage, will be taking place at:
Asylum Cafe
253 Asylum St
Hartford, CT 06103
While here, sr members will be available to answer questions of newer members. The focus of this weekend's meetups will be basic openers and body language. Everyone should come prepared with atleast 3 to 5 openers which they will use out in the field. Remember, you can't get the girl if you don't talk to her. This location is a good warm up spot to start your gaming.

From there, 11:00 PM, Part two of the meetup, the game, will be taking place at:
Black Bear Saloon
187 Allyn St
Hartford, CT 06103
This is where it all goes down boys. This is where we go to have fun and own the joint. The members of this group have a lot of potential, it's time you embrace it.

Ages: 20-30s

Dress Code: Classy, no extreme peacocking (Fuzzy hats, Boas, Dildos on your head *Sam*)

Any questions, just let me know.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Sam, Roca & Mikey - See their profile pics
item.name: Asylum Cafe / Black Bear - Hartford - April 17th - Fri Night
